document.full_text: public interest groups are keeping the option of lawsuits against the federal communications commission on the table to fight for stronger internet "neutrality" rules, an executive at a public interest law firm said on saturday.
document.title: lawsuits to strengthen net traffic rules possible
lines_and_colors: public interest groups are keeping the option of lawsuits against the federal communications commission on the table to fight for stronger internet "neutrality" rules, an executive at a public interest law firm said on saturday.
